title: Bluff Master
overview: A young lad turns a conman after losing his parents at a young age. Money is his only priority in life and he tricks the greedy and gullible lot to make sure his monetary needs are met. However, things go awry when he gets caught by a gang of baddies. How he escapes from their clutches and finds the purpose to his life through a woman forms the story of Bluff Master.
